sentences.en: Do you think there's something to homeopathy as well?

sentences.en: Eyelashes long stretch slowly, the sky and the stars homeopathy, the decline in your eye.
sentences.cn: 长长的睫毛缓缓舒展, 天上的星星顺势而下, 滑落你的眼帘.

sentences.en: Homeopathy for, make good use of stop loss is the only way to win investors.
sentences.cn: 顺势而为, 用好止损位是投资者获胜的不二法门.

sentences.en: Homeopathy is a popular form of medicine.
sentences.cn: 顺势疗法是一种流行的非正统疗法.

sentences.en: It forced jumps all of a sudden jump streams, homeopathy put a turtle thrown out.

sentences.en: Market in 2008 was in swing in 2009, perhaps out of homeopathy.

sentences.en: Most doctors appear to recognize homeopathy as a legitimate form of medicine.
sentences.cn: 大多数医生似乎都接受顺势疗法是一种合理的医疗手段。

sentences.en: Q:Do you think there’s something to homeopathy as well?
sentences.cn: 《科学》：你认为你的工作也有些顺势疗法的意思？

sentences.en: There is no justification in all of science for this idea -- and yet there remains some slim evidence that homeopathy works.
sentences.cn: 所有的科学都没有任何正当理由为这一思想辩护——然而，却有一些微小的证据证明顺势疗法在起作用。

words.tran_cn: 顺势疗法的；同种疗法的
同种疗法医师；顺势医疗论者

trans.tran_en: a system of medicine in which a disease is treated by giving extremely small amounts of a substance that causes the disease
